description:
A Kuan, a young man who grew up in a single-parent family, could not find warmth in his family, so he turned to friendship and love to find sustenance, but he was also involved in the friendship.
He almost lost his life in a storm.
It was also because of this storm that A Kuan had the opportunity to go up the mountain and met Lao Zen and two young monks in a ruined temple. A Taiwanese bear was also killed in the process.
A group of scientific workers went to the mountains to practice their survival skills in the wild.
Through the different lifestyles in the mountains and in the city, A Kuan and Fang Sheng Xiong each experienced an important journey of discovery...
source: youtube/googletranslate
